description: The political science research practicum provides a new opportunity to realize the college and department's commitment to undergraduate research. Students will put research skills into practive by gathering and analyzing empirical evidence, and producing a substantive research project. With research topics varying from term to term, students will develop methodological expertise surrounding a current problem in political science, and will collect and analyze data to address the problem. Offered alternate years.
name: Research Practicum
notes: This course includes an academic civic engagement (ACE) component.
title: Political Science Research Practicum
